snippet: ADES--Alan. We note with sorrow the passing of our member, Dr. Alan Ades and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl and President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
lead_paragraph: ADES--Alan. We note with sorrow the passing of our member, Dr. Alan Ades and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl and President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
